page.title: 03A PUBLICAN'S DAY
page.content: We interviewed the landlord of the COACH and HORSES, Mr.Ronald Marsh, and asked him to describe a typical day in his life. Mr. Marsh told us that he starts work at about 8.00 am and goes to bed at 1.00 pm. He starts by cleaning the pub and getting the shelves stocked with bottles. Then he opens the pub at 11.00 am and is busy from 11.30 am to 3.00 pm. He serves drinks and food to the customers, with a smile, and is pleasant with everyone. He closes the pub at 3.30 pm and reopens at 5.00 pm. He stops serving drinks at 11.00 pm and washes up and tidys up before he goes to bed at 1.00 am. {A PUBLICANS LIFE IS NOT AN EASY ONE !!
